description: Awayuki Kaoru is a former author of romance novels and Himeno`s father. Before marrying Natsue, Kaoru spent much of his time drinking sake while Himeno balanced the budget and cooked their meals. He stopped writing due to Himeno`s mother`s death. In the anime adaptation, he is shown turning to sculpture after his marriage to Natsue.
name: Awayuki Kaoru
